data.name: Phantom Doctrine - Deluxe Edition Upgrade
data.detailed_description:
The full Phantom Doctrine Original Digital Soundtrack includes all of the riveting tracks composed by celebrated Composer and Sound Designers Marcin Przybyłowicz (The Witcher series, Hard West) and Jan Sanejko. All tracks are provided as High Quality MP3, and FLAC files.

Track Listings:

  • Phantom Doctrine Suite (03:54) - Jan Sanejko, Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • This Is no Coincidence (02:31) - Jan Sanejko
  • Above Top Secret (03:15) - Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • Your Handler Is Already Compromised (02:28) - Jan Sanejko
  • I'm Told You're Looking for Information (03:15) - Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • We're Not Taking Any Prisoners (02:46) - Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • The Ultimate Safeguard (01:56) - Jan Sanejko
  • Clinically Paranoid (02:54) - Jan Sanejko
  • Undertow (03:15)- Jan Sanejko
  • Intel from Vladivostok (02:38) - Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • Well Then, Don't Trust Anyone (03:00) - Jan Sanejko
  • That Went Well. Too Well. (02:01) - Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • A Ton of Paperwork If You Die (03:00) - Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • What Had We Missed? (02:15) - Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • The System Is Fairly Self-Sufficient (02:56) - Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • Nuclear Program (02:24) - Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • Rogue Agent. Deserter. Terrorist. (01:25) - Jan Sanejko
  • Welcome to Hong Kong (01:48) - Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • That's the Convenient Version (04:06) - Jan Sanejko
  • The More You Resist, the More Painful It Will Be (03:00) - Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • Pulling the Strings (02:31) - Jan Sanejko
  • It Will Barely Be Sufficient (02:58) - Jan Sanejko, Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • I Prefer to Keep It Professional, if I Can (03:03) - Jan Sanejko
  • The Truth Is Much More Interesting (02:22) - Jan Sanejko
  • He's Useless to Us Now (00:58) - Jan Sanejko
  • Kilobytes of Data (01:23) - Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • You Won’t Hear from Me Again (01:06) - Marcin Przybyłowicz
  • No Shame to Be Outplayed by a Puppet Master (00:53) - Marcin Przybyłowicz

data.short_description: The full Phantom Doctrine Original Digital Soundtrack includes all of the riveting tracks composed by celebrated Composer and Sound Designers Marcin Przybyłowicz (The Witcher series, Hard West) and Jan Sanejko.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
